mapper.sql: sc_idx, sc_title, sc_version, sc_icon, sc_summary, sc_location, sc_reference, sc_description, sc_category
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sw_catalog AS sc WHERE 1=1
AND sc_title LIKE '%${scTitle}%'
ORDER BY sc.sc_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sw_catalog(sc_title, sc_version, sc_icon, sc_summary, sc_location, sc_reference, sc_description, sc_category) VALUES(#{scTitle}, #{scVersion}, #{scIcon}, #{scSummary}, #{scLocation}, #{scReference}, #{scDescription}, #{scCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT sc_idx, sc_title, sc_version, sc_icon, sc_summary FROM sw_catalog WHERE sc_idx IN (SELECT ref_idx FROM sw_catalog_relation_catalog WHERE sc_idx = ${scIdx})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sw_catalog_relation_catalog WHERE sc_idx = ${sc_idx} AND ref_idx = ${refIdx}
DELETE FROM sw_catalog_relation_workflow WHERE sc_idx = ${sc_idx} AND ref_idx = ${refIdx}
